it.polimi.se2019.client.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This Util class provides some common helper methods to all the other classes in the view package.
    Author:
    andreahuang

      • isLastSelection

        public static boolean isLastSelection(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane progressBar)
        The isLastSelection method checks whether the progress bar has only green circles.
        Parameters:
        progressBar - is the grid pane containing the progress bar.
        Returns:
        the predicate that the last color is colored or not

      • getCorrectPlayerBoardMode

        public static java.lang.String getCorrectPlayerBoardMode(Player player)
        The getCorrectPlayerBoardMode method retrieves the value bar of a player, then it returns the game mode.
        Parameters:
        player - the player for which the player player board is going to be shown.
        Returns:
        a string indicating the game mode.

      • setLabelColor

        The setLabelColor method sets a label's color according to the player color input.
        Parameters:

        playerColor - the color used to set the label.

      • getPlayerToken

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getPlayerToken(PlayerColor color)
        The getPlayerToken method returns the correct color token to add in damage and/or marker bar.
        Parameters:
        color - is the player color.
        Returns:
        an image of the player color token.
